name: bnj1101
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mpbir(wex(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, wi(wa(w0, w2), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wi(wa(w0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wi(wa(w0, w2), w1))
-| wb(wex(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, wi(wa(w0, w2), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(wa(w0, w2), w1))
-| wex(s0, wi(w2, w1))

body.origin:

cumulated.origin:
